name: In Between a Rock and a Hard Place
name_original: In Between a Rock and a Hard Place
description:
Texas EGaDS! Fall 2021 Game Jam submission.

Take the fight of your life. In Between A Rock And A Hard Place places you right into the middle of the action. Battle the biggest obstacle standing in your way!

Controls:

  • Attack: Left Click
  • Movement: A and D 
  • Jump: Space bar

Team members:

Alison Li

Justin Wu

Lauren Ouyang

Other notes:

We were a bit tight on time, so the game currently doesn't reset or end. Feel free to force quit at anytime using Alt+F4
